## Account.(constructor)

creates an account from a mnemonic if provided, otherwise from entropy

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(mnemonic?: string);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  mnemonic | <code>string</code> | the mnemonic to use for the account |
